kit_1: There you are, prancing around like you're the Clan leader's kit or something. Just because you caught a beetle today doesn't mean you're the best at everything.
Look at you, always the center of attention. Everyone always cooing and pawing at you. Well, I don't need all that. I'm going to be the greatest warrior this Clan has ever seen, just you wait.
So, you climbed to the top of the elders' den, big deal! I can do that too, I just... don't want to. Yeah, that's it. I've got better things to do than show off like you do.
Oh, don't give me that look. You think you're so great, don't you? Well, one day I'll show you. I'll be the one everyone is talking about. And then we'll see who's the best.
Just you wait, one day I'll be an apprentice, and then a warrior. And I won't forget how you've been. You'll see. I'll prove to you and to everyone that I'm just as good... No, I'm better!
kit_2: There you are, acting like you own the nursery again.
Always hogging the best spots in the den, always first in line for fresh-kill. Well, I've had enough of it. You're not the only kit in this Clan, you know!
And stop telling me what to do! I'll explore the camp if I want to. I don't care if it's against the rules. You're not my mother!
I hope StarClan makes you a medicine cat. Then you won't be able to boss anyone around anymore. You'll have to deal with stinky herbs and heal tick bites all day long!
kit_3: Hey! There you are! I've been looking all over for you! I found the most amazing bug today by the nursery. It was huge! You have to come see it.
Do you remember that time when we pretended to be Clan leaders and started giving orders to the elders? They were so surprised! That was the best day ever.
You're the best thing about the nursery. Even better than fresh moss and feathers! And when we're warriors, we'll be the best in the Clan, I know it. No mouse will be safe from us!
kit_4: Hi there! I saw you standing up to that older kit earlier, the one who keeps stealing our moss balls. That was really brave of you. I don't think I could have done that.

I really look up to you, you know? You're always fair, and you never let anyone push you around. When we play 'Clans,' I always want to be your deputy. Even though you always make me the medicine cat.
I hope that when I become an apprentice, I'll be as brave as you. But until then, I'm glad you're my friend. Cause I know you'll always lead me in the right direction!
kit_5: Hey, it's you! I was hoping to find you here. I've got something to tell you...
You remember that dream I told you about, right? The one where I was an apprentice, catching my first mouse? I had it again last night, but this time, there was an owl, too.
It was so scary... but knowing I could tell you about it makes it less frightening.

You're always there for me, like when I fell into that thorn bush, and you helped me get out. Or when we got lost outside camp, and you led us back home. You never laugh at me or tell me I'm silly. You just... listen. And that means a lot.
kit_6: Hey, do you want to play warriors?
I'll be Firestar, the bravest leader ever! You can be my deputy, Brambleclaw.
We'll patrol the nursery, make sure no evil cats sneak in!
Wait! What's that? Oh, it's just a leaf. Well, it could've been an evil cat!
We're the best patrol ever! Let's play again tomorrow, okay?
kit_7: Wow, you get to train and leave the camp! That must be so cool!
Do you think I'll be a good apprentice too? I want to be the best!
Can you teach me a battle move? Just a small one! I promise I won't use it on anyone... not much anyway.
Imagine, me catching my first mouse! I can't wait to be an apprentice like you!
Thanks for talking to me! I can't wait to join you in the apprentice's den soon!
kit_8: You know all the herbs, right? That's so cool!
Can you show me some? I promise I won't eat any, even if they smell nice!
I heard that you can talk to StarClan! Is that true? What do they sound like?
Being a medicine cat apprentice sounds hard... but I think you're really brave for doing it.
I hope I can be as smart and brave as you one day!
kit_9: You're always so calm and peaceful, how do you do it?
I tried sitting still like you, but I always end up wanting to play or run around!
Do you think StarClan gave you extra patience? Can they give me some too?
I think it's really nice how you help everyone get along.
When I grow up, I want to be good at solving problems too!
kit_10: Wow! You're so strong and fast! I want to be just like you one day!
Will you teach me a cool move? Please, please, please!
Can I see your battle scars? They look so fierce!
You must have been so brave to earn them. I can't wait to earn my own!
I'm going to be the bravest warrior ever, just like you!
kit_11: You're always so kind and caring, it's really nice!
I hurt my paw once, and you fixed it right up! You're like magic!
I want to help cats when they're hurt too. You're my hero!
One day, I'm going to be as helpful as you are!
kit_12: You're always so good at stopping fights, even better than my mother!
Do you think I could be a mediator? I stopped a fight between two kits over a mouse once!
I want to help keep the peace. It's important, right?
You're always so wise and fair, I want to be like that!
Thanks for always helping us, even when we're just arguing over silly things.
kit_13: You're the most important cat in the clan! It's so amazing to talk to you!
Do you think I could be a leader one day? I would make sure every cat gets their favorite prey!
I bet StarClan talks to you every day! What's it like?
Being a leader must be hard, but you're so good at it!
I want to be just as strong and wise as you are one day!
kit_14: You're like almost the most important cat in the clan! It's so cool to talk to you!
Do you think I could be a deputy one day? I would get to go on patrol every day!
Being a deputy must be hard, but you're so good at it!
I want to be just as strong and smart as you are one day!
kit_15: Your stories are the best! Can you tell me one?
I want to be a brave warrior like in your stories!
Even though you're kinda smelly... and have a lot of ticks.
Oops! Sorry! Did I say that out loud?
